mapper.sql: tel, subremark, supremark, czman, czdate, ip, ucid, type
mapper.update:
update
set issh=#{issh}, shman=#{shman}, shremark=#{shremark}, shdate=now() where find_in_set(id,#{id})
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.tel, a.supremark, a.subremark, a.czman, a.shman, a.shremark, a.ip, a.issh, DATE_FORMAT(a.shdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as shdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.czdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as czdate, c.zxxm as czname, d.zxxm as shname from a left join tzxlb c on a.czman=c.id left join tzxlb d on a.shman=d.id where 1=1
and find_in_set(a.id,#{ids})

select a.id, a.tel, a.supremark, a.subremark, a.czman, a.shman, a.shremark, a.ip, a.issh, a.type, a.ucid, DATE_FORMAT(a.shdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as shdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.czdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as czdate, c.zxxm as czname, d.zxxm as shname, b.lywj, b.id as lyid from a left join trecord b on a.ucid=b.ucid left join tzxlb c on a.czman=c.id left join tzxlb d on a.shman=d.id where a.id = #{id}

select a.id, a.tel, a.supremark, a.subremark, a.czman, a.shman, a.shremark, a.ip, a.issh, a.type, a.ucid, DATE_FORMAT(a.shdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as shdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.czdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as czdate, c.zxxm as czname, d.zxxm as shname, b.lywj, b.id as lyid from a left join trecord b on a.ucid=b.ucid left join tzxlb c on a.czman=c.id left join tzxlb d on a.shman=d.id where a.tel = #{tel}
and a.id != #{id}
select param_value from sys_param where param_code=#{param_code}
